website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Clip 3 is a better-sounding version of one of our favorite micro Bluetooth speakers.
pros: The JBL Clip 3 offers improved sound and battery life in a more durable design than its predecessor
It's fully waterproof and sounds very good for its small size
The integrated carabiner allows you to clip the speaker to a bag or hang it from a peg
cons: It's a tad larger and heavier than the Clip 2, which is still available at a lower price

customer_reviews.title: Loud but not clear
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is everything it's supposed to be but it's just not spectacular. The speaker is loud but not very clear. Worse at high volume. Very little or no bass but you can't expect much from a small unit like this. Good battery life and can get wet so that's a plus. Probably best option for price. Not sure if it's worth $65 when the previous model is $35 and doesn't sound or function any better
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three months of use
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good speaker, I feel like over time the battery life went down. I literally only had it for 3 months, received it on May 4 and it stopped working today... it turns off and when you connect the Bluetooth then it shuts off immediately, even though it’s been charging and connected to the plug. I’m disappointed... it was good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are much better alternatives
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my Mifa A1 portable speaker. I figured JBL, a well established brand, would make a good product. I was so underwhelmed by the sound performance that I am gonna ditch it an go back to the $17 Mifa. That Mifa BUMPS, this JBL sounds scratchy, has terrible bass and is surprisingly weak. I can barely hear the music even when riding my bike at a medium pace. It looks good and has a more convenient shape than the Mifa, but what does it matter if it's basically dead weight? Buy the Mifa
customer_reviews.author: L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is underrated
customer_reviews.text: I use this for 10hrs straight at work (automobile factory) with the volume roughly at 80%, battery is at 55% when I'm leaving work, so I can go two days before charging. Sound quality is great. I picked this up not only do to the reviews on Amazon but because almost everyone at work has one hanging from their neck or shirt, definitely a good buy in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for my golf cart and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker all the time. It's easy to connect to and the sound is really good. I've dropped it a few times and it hardly shows a mark on it and it works great. It's been spilled on and caught in the rain on the golf course a number of times. I'd recommend this to anybody looking for a good portable speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Sapko

customer_reviews.title: Water and mud proof
customer_reviews.text: I clip this to the back of my hydration pack while mountain biking, so I can listen to music on the trail but still capable of hearing my surroundings. Works perfectly. It definitely is water/mud proof. I did a long ride in the rain on paved trails, while jamming. The speaker has also had a fair amount of mud thrown at it from my back tire. 100% reccomend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B

customer_reviews.title: I do not like it, and I bought a flip 5, a This one returned back
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the sound quality. There are a lot of high frequencies and very few low frequencies. There is not enough good subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof claim is false
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, but the waterproof claim is not accurate. We had this sitting in the cup holder of a pool float (not submerged in water) and it got splashed. It now only powers on some times, the play and volume down buttons don’t work. Volume up works 80% of the time. Really disappointed how easy it was to ruin this with a slash of water when it claims being waterproof (not just resistant!)
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: It kinda sucks that I ordered a gray one and got sent a black one. I needed it already and I couldn’t wait and go through the hassle of returning it, but other than that the speaker is amazing. Sound is good, about what you’d expect from a speaker this size. It’s super easy to use and the clip comes in handy. Honestly for under fifty bucks, you can’t go wrong with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: V. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for a guy who bikes
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for a birthday gift. The price is right and it is perfect for him as he bicycles and wants to listen to music and still be safe. (No headphones so he can hear cars approaching) The speaker is sturdy and plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: dissreader

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was enjoying the sound quality and portability until mine stopped charging after two weeks. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: EHC

customer_reviews.title: Loud and great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great compact loud speaker. I have take. It so many places. The battery lasts for hours and the sound is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the shower
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old teen girl play this speaker all the time. I'm a bit tired of it, but when they're doing great in school, parent must be lenient.
customer_reviews.author: justnc

customer_reviews.title: JBL never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd JBL speaker purchase. JBL never disappoints! Great sound for the size! Haven’t put the waterproof claim to test yet, will keep you updated!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement for my Clip 2, bigger speaker and mellow sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rumbatech

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for! I wanted a lightweight speaker to attach to my golf bag. The sound quality is good for the golf course and doesn’t interfere with wanting to carry my bag. A friend that I play golf with liked it so much he bought one also. I highly recommend the JBL Clip3 for anyone wanting a lightweight speaker for sporting activities.
customer_reviews.author: StrangeDays

customer_reviews.title: not much bass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hands free phone and music when outside... works well as hands free, the music is decent, but very little bass
customer_reviews.author: James Tress

customer_reviews.title: Good value, sound quality not much better than Clip 2, but Clips are the best value
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, not much different audio quality compared to our Clip 2 though, we just needed a second Bluetooth speaker, and Clips are the best value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, battery is average... but the clip broke off in less than a month, completely defeating the purpose of selecting this (you know, to CLIP to things) over cheaper options.
customer_reviews.author: Tasjaana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside hard hat
customer_reviews.text: But don't get greedy and play it to loud everyone else can hear it. That is dangerous and it's the reason so many sites don't allow radios
customer_reviews.author: Peter Desiderio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: Got my teen son this for CHRISTMAS and way cool for his backpack. Great style and sound. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Macken

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: Out shine all others I have tried for the price. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for shower
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker to use in the shower. It works great. I keep my phone on the charging station in my bedroom and listen to my tunes in the shower/bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like having this to use while I play golf!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and pretty loud
customer_reviews.text: Woke definitely recommend this. I’ve had it for about 1 year and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: very portable and easy to program. Holds a good charge too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: The best speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker! Always carrying with me. Good sound quality for the price, long battery life, nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the bass?
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it except the lack of bass. Sounds ik,but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie adams

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Just can't beat this little speaker for the price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor A. LoPiccolo

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Quit working less than a month after purchasing. The sound became garbled, no way of fixing it. Just missed the return window too. I don’t recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Dingbat

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the Price and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Vest speaker for the price on the market and waterproof have bought 5 as gifts and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! We use this speaker for camping & while in the shower. Quality is great and it arrived very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and can get nice and loud
customer_reviews.text: I use these for frisbee golfing and they do a great job. I just clip them onto my bag and they are as loud as I want while still sounding nice.
customer_reviews.author: perihwk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in all elements
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple portable speakers ranging from small to large and this by far is the device I use the most. Beach, parks, biking, walks, heck even the shower. This goes with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Bardo

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! Purchased 12/2018 and already is not working! Can’t get it to turn on after full day of charging
customer_reviews.author: kim phillips

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: bought for my husband. He loves it ! it's really loud to play in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Korpenfelt

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, easy to carry with clip, light weight and connects via Bluetooth easily. The sounds is much more substantial than what I expected. No worries about how loud it can project.
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost every day and the charge just lasts and lasts. Great sound quality, too. One of my favorite Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Z

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small but powerful speaker. Great sound. We plan to use while bike riding
customer_reviews.author: MichaelStu

customer_reviews.title: 4.5, almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good overall, I am very picky about sound quality... I know, you get what you paid for but I think the loudness and distortion of sound doesn’t live up to the hype. I would give 4.5 stars. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Lev Bugaev

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What great sound comes from this small speaker! HOOK IT TO THE PADDLE BOARD AND EXPLORE!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for its size , very handy clip & the battery lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: brock mittry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker
customer_reviews.text: For its size, it’s one of the best speakers. I also have the mini boze speaker as well, and I can’t tell a difference between the two. Except this is significantly less.
customer_reviews.author: ZBrandt22

customer_reviews.title: ... as long as i expected at max volume but good quality speaker
customer_reviews.text: Battery life not as long as i expected at max volume but good quality speaker overall
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. A little bit more expensive than I hoped, but great product.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a lot of sound. Great quality. Perfect for working outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathaleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed! Wrong item color arrived. I cannot return the item right now for some reason
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like how loud it is for the size and how portable it is. Perfect for workouts and practices
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Clip 3 sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for such a small portable speaker. I use it to go kayaking
customer_reviews.author: jimmy miliadis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like everything about this little speaker. It has great sounds and the materials feel high end. It's lightweight, has a long battery life, and isn't expensive. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: VMA74

customer_reviews.title: Awsome sound
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work and in the shower. This item is better than my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps malfunchaning
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great but it keeps cutting out for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: co little unit digest you buy a head ph amp, blucoil/aqua,their cheap totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Buy a small headphone amp makes it twice as good

product_meta.title: JBL Clip 3 Portable Waterproof Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - Gray
product_meta.description: Clip and Play Like no other, the JBL Clip 3 is a unique ultra-portable, ultra-rugged and waterproof Bluetooth® speaker that is small in size but with surprisingly big sound. The upgraded durable and fully integrated carabiner clips to your clothes, belt loop or backpack, making the Clip 3 your outdoor companion on every adventure. The Clip 3 is IPX7 waterproof and offers 10 hours of playtime, powered by a 1000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery, allowing you to bring your music with you. A built-in noise and echo-cancelling speakerphone gives you crystal clear calls with the press of a button. Wireless Bluetooth® Streaming Wirelessly stream high-quality sound from your smartphone or tablet. 10 Hours of Playtime Built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery supports up to 10 hours of playtime. IPX7 Waterproof No more worrying about rain or spills; you can even immerse it in water. Integrated Carabiner The fully integrated metal carabiner protects the speaker from damage and lets you easily hook it to a backpack or belt loop. Speakerphone Take crystal-clear calls from your speaker with the touch of a button, thanks to the noise and echo-cancelling speakerphone. Lifestyle Material with Durable Design The improved, durable fabric material and rugged rubber housing protects your speaker on all your adventures.
